channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar Incident Forensics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar Incident Forensics

item.title: CVE-2018-1647|2024-08-05T04:07:44.048Z -- ibm -- qradar%20incident%20forensics
item.description: IBM QRadar Incident Forensics 7.2 and 7.3 does not properly restrict the size or amount of resources requested which could allow an unauthenticated user to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 144650.

item.title: CVE-2018-1649|2024-08-05T04:07:44.105Z -- ibm -- qradar%20incident%20forensics
item.description: IBM QRadar Incident Forensics 7.2 and 7.3 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 144655.
